name: DynamoAutomation
description: Batch process Revit models by driving Revit (and the Dynamo addin) from the outside using the Dynamo sandbox.
contents: Config.Read - Reads a configuration file at a given filepath. Items in the config file need to be separated by line breaks. Expected format for each item is key=value, JournalFiles.Cleanup - Moves all journal files created during a batch-processing operation to a specified directory, RevitAddinsPath.ByVersion - Returns the path of Revit Addins folder based on a given Revit version, RevitExecutablePath.ByVersion - Returns the path of Revit.exe based on a given Revit version
